The Ivory Carver is an as of yet non-existent settlement location that was introduced in the Before the Wall white box expansion. One of the gear pieces in this white box, the White Dragon Gauntlets, has the Ivory Carver listed on the reverse face of the card as the location where it is crafted.

The Leather Worker is a settlement location found in the Kingdom Death: Monster Core Game. It is unlocked by endeavoring at the Skinnery.

Craftable Gear.

Leather Boots
Leather Bracers
Leather Cuirass

Leather-Making.

The Mask Maker is a settlement location found in the Kingdom Death: Monster Core Game. It is unlocked by archiving the Forsaker Mask rare gear card during the settlement phase.

Location Text.
Craftable Gear.
Antelope Mask
Death Mask
God Mask
Man Mask
Phoenix Mask
White Lion Mask

Legendary Monsters.
A departing survivor with a mask in their gear grid may lead their hunting party to a legendary monster. Rules for these monsters are found on the Legendary Monsters story event.
 White Lion Mask. You may hunt the Great Golden Cat.
 Antelope Mask. You may hunt the Mad Steed.
 Phoenix Mask. You may hunt the Golden Eyed King.

The Organ Grinder is a settlement location found in the Kingdom Death: Monster Core Game. It is unlocked by endeavoring at the Lantern Hoard, The Sun, or The Throne.

Craftable Gear.
Dried Acanthus
Fecal Salve
Lucky Charm
Monster Grease
Monster Tooth Necklace
Stone Noses

Augury.
Roll 1d10.
The survivor endeavors to glean the meaning of existence. Roll on the table. Add +1 to your roll result if your understanding is 3 or higher.

Build.
Barber Surgeon
Cost:
3x organ
1x hide

Notes.
Prior to the release of Kingdom Death: Monster 1.6, the Organ Grinder was used to build the Stone Circle settlement location.

The Sacred Pool is a settlement location found in the Sunstalker Expansion. It is unlocked during the People of the Sun story event The Pool and the Sun.

Location Text.
Level 1.
 Sacred Water:
Once per settlement phase, the settlement drinks the oil that builds up on the surface of the pool. Intimacy.

 Purification Ceremony:
You may endeavor here once per lifetime. Your body is infused with sacred water and Purified (record this). You cannot depart this year. Gain the Overprotective disorder and roll 1d10. On 8+, gain +1 permanent attribute of your choice. Otherwise, gain +1 permanent strength or accuracy.

Level 2.
Craftable Gear:
Sun Vestments
Sunring Bow

Level 3.
Craftable Gear:
Apostle Crown
Prism Mace

Sun Stealing.
You sit for a year, in the boiling darkness of the Shrine. Gain the Hellfire secret fighting art. You cannot depart this year.

Notes.
The Purification Ceremony erroneously refers to the Overprotective disorder, and the "Protective" disorder.

The Weapon Crafter is a settlement location found in the Kingdom Death: Monster Core Game. It is unlocked by endeavoring at the Bone Smith.

Craftable Gear.
Counterweighted Axe
Scrap Bone Spear
Scrap Dagger
Scrap Lantern
Scrap Rebar
Scrap Sword
Skullcap Hammer
Whistling Mace
Zanbato

Scrap Scavenge.
Roll 1d10.
A survivor carefully searches the settlement edge, groping in the dark for pieces of broken lanterns and suitable debris.

Special Innovate.
Scrap Smelting
Cost:
2x scrap
5x bone
5x organ

Notes.
Prior to the release of Kingdom Death: Monster 1.6, the Blood Sheath, Finger of God and Rainbow Katana were crafted at this location, but were moved to the Plumery settlement location. Additionally the ability to craft the Scrap Bone Spear, Scrap Lantern, and Scrap Rebar was added.
